API responsible for complete management of the Ctrl+Eat Fast Food restaurant

request.description: Searches and returns a client's data based on their identifier
Searches and returns all registered client data
Register a client
Update the order status
Add an item to the order
Checkout the order
Searches and returns a order's data based on their identifier
Searches and returns a order's data based on their status. If not provided, then all orders will be returned.
Register an order
Searchs and returns a product's image
Upload an image for the product
Search and return a product's data based on their identifier
Update a product
Delete a product
Searchs and returns all products based on their category
Searches and returns a product's category based on their identifier
Update product category
Delete a product category
Searches and returns all registered product's categories

Search and returns all products
